definition[0]: a small pipe on the side of a container that you pour liquid out through
definition[1]: if liquid or fire spouts from somewhere, it comes out very quickly in a powerful stream
example[0]: Blood was spouting from the wound in her arm.
definition[2]: to send out liquid or flames very quickly in a powerful stream
definition[3]: to talk a lot about something in a boring or annoying way
example[2]: My father was spouting his usual nonsense!
example[3]: I hate it when he spouts off like that!
example[4]: Iâ€™m tired of listening to Jim spouting about politics.
definition[4]: if a whale spouts, it sends out a stream of water from a hole in its head
